thread.title: Mary-Ellen
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Mary-Ellen

author: Mary-Ellen
title: Mary-Ellen
text: Hubby wanted to send something different to his Mom in FL for Valentine's Day besides the usual flowers. The mini cupcakes were a big hit with her and I was pleased with the ease of ordering. They were delivered promptly and on time as promised. I will be happy to use Bake Me a Wish for more gifting in the future.
